textBeforeTable: Available No Fee Apartments at 455 West 37th Street --> }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk')); fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs); js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#xfbml=1"; js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id; if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;} var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
textAfterTable: Apartment Features Owner:: Sitting 24-stories high 455W37 provides its residents with luxurious conveniences without sacrificing on comfort or space. The apartments of 455W37 embody what life in Manhattan is all about. Each home offers a clean, contemporary luxury design enhanced by the stretching views from oversized windows, stainless steel appliances, and spacious living areas for both you and your guests. 455W37 offers its tenants priceless conveniences to improve their busy lifestyles. There is a doorman and concierge who cater to your needs, a superb roof deck lined with seating and pavilion tents, and a private fitness center with state-of-the-art equipment. 455W37 is located on the West Side of Manhattan in what is known as Hudson Yards. This up and coming neighborhood embraces the stylistic advances of Chelsea and offers a unique and promising slice of city life. Come be a part of the energetic and organic feel of this luxury apartment building and make it your own. Building Features & Amenities Concierge Fitness Center Bicycle Storage Landscaped Roof Deck Mid-rise (7-25 Floors) Built 2009 Rental Property Pet policy: Pets OK , Dogs under 50lbs and up to two cats
